handDesc.handNote:
description of letters, possibly including letter-heights
The scribe appears to have two ways of writing ḍ. The less common type occurs twice in 6v1. The scribe sometimes cancels taling with hulu, as in 4v2, 6r2, 6r4.

body.div:
||0|| A:vigna:m astu , ||0|| riṅ aṣṭadḍu:ṣṭa maṅke varahakna: ,, 0 ,, A:mateni voṁ tan padoṣa, hakon amatenana voṁ tan padoṣa,, A:ṅanini voṁ tan padoṣa,,
ṅanini tan padoṣa,, AkbulanAkəmbulan paṅan lavan ḍuṣṭa,, ṣapaduluran saparane lavan ḍusṭa:,, Amitra lavan ḍuṣṭa,, haveḥ gnaḥ riṁ duṣṭa,, Atuluṁ duṣṭa,, Iku aṣṭaduṣṭa harane,, riṁ haṣṭadusṭa:
kaṁ tətlu hadoṣa pati kaṁ lilima hadoṣa harttha:,, katutuR̥na deniṁṅ aR̥p∙ vəruA patutuṅgalane,, hənḍi ta kaṅ adoṣa pati ,, 0 ,, [#2] riṁ voṁṅ amateni voṁ tan padosa:, doṣa
pati,, riṁṅ akonana A:mateni voṁ tan padoṣa, doṣa pati,, riṁ hanatoni voṁ tan padoṣa, doṣa pati,, hənḍi ta kaṁ lilima hadoṣa harttha:,, sapaṅan lavan ḍuṣṭa,sapadulu
ran saparane lavan ḍuṣṭa, ṣamitra lavan ḍuṣṭa sapaduluran saparane lavan ḍuṣṭa, ṣamitra lavan ḍuṣṭa samitra lavan duṣṭa, sapaduluran saparane lavan duṣṭa, samitra lavan duṣṭa, sapadulūralan lavan duṣṭa, haveḥ gnaḥ riṁ duṣṭa, Atuluṁ duṣṭa,, Iku haṣṭaduṣṭa harane,, kaṅ lilima pada doṣanana harttha: maroṁ lakṣa ri duṣṭa satuṅgal-tuṅgal∙ maroṅ lakṣa ri duṣṭa satuṅgal-tuṅgal nora vnaṅ doṣanana pati denira saṅ amava bhumi; amateni voṅ tan padoṣa, akon amatenana voṅ tan padoṣa, anatoni voṅ tan padoṣa; duṣṭa tətlu iku, yan sayəkti sacihna, katlu ḍəṇḍa pati, arane katlu duṣṭa atoh avake, yan amalaku huripən iṅ saṅ amava bhumi, katlu ḍəṇḍanən pataṅ lakṣa vivijinən iṅ duṣṭa satuṅgalsatuṅgal kahilaṅane doṣane; hana dene kaṅ sapaṅan lāvan duṣṭa, sadulur lavan duṣṭa, amitra lāvan duṣṭa, aveh gnah riṅ duṣṭa, iku kalima paḍa ḍəṇḍanən aṅroṅ lakṣa deni
ra saṅ amava bhūmi,, yen uvūs enak ka:sapekṣean deniṁ sakṣi kaduṣṭane ,, 0 ,,
maniḥ § yen ha:na voṁ halavas amitra lavan ḍuṣṭa,, haṅiṁ nora vəruḥ yen ḍuṣṭa, dene dohe humahe §
desane, kaṅ amitra hiṅ iya, kadənḍaha pataṁ tali təluṅ atak denira saṅ amava bhūmi,, saṅkane kadənda, dene halavas apamitra tur anəṅguḥ tan vəruh iṅ iya yen duṣṭa ,, 0 ,, yen ta:n ala
vas dene hamitra, tuhu-tuhu tan vəruḥ iṅ iya, yen duṣṭa, tan kaḍəṇḍahan denira saṅ a:mava bhūmi, Apan den tan alavas dene hamitra, tur duruṁ vəruḥ yen duṣṭa, maṅkana raṣa saṁ hyaṁṅ agama,
, 0 ,,
hana kavula vadon miṅgat sakiṁ gustine, iṅiṅgatakən deniṁ voṁ len∙, katmu dene gustine, kaṅ aṅiṅgatakən∙, kaḍəṇḍaha pataṁ lakṣa denira saṅ amava bhūmi,, hana dene huta
ṅe voṁ vadon ka:ṅ iṅiṅgatakən ika:, mulihanikəl saguṅ iṁ hutaṁ, mariṁ gustine voṁ vadon ika:, tur palakonana pavadal gave, salavase miṅgat sakiṁ gustine, Apan maliṁṅ ara
n iṁ voṅ aṅiṅgatakən kavulaniṁ voṁ ,, 0 ,,
hana kavulaniṁ voṁ den-kon ameta gave nndene gustine, siṅ sagavene, hiṅupahan gavene deniṁṅ len∙, naṅkən olih upahən gu
stine hamet∙, vəkasan mati kavula hika:, pinaten deniṁ duṣṭa, yen ḍuruṅ aveḥ hupahan kaṅ aṅupah-upaḥ, A:veha hupahan iṅ kaṅ aduve kavula, deniṁ patine kavulane
, tan∙ vnaṁ kaṅ aṅupah-upaḥ yan vicaranən∙ ,, 0 ,,
Ana voṅ apəpəgatan alaki-harabi, papa§t∙ yaktiniṁṅ apəpəgatan sacihnane,, sakṣi, haṅgəmpal pisisadulur ūjar iṁ laki, haveḥ bañu rahup∙
, haveḥ vija bras∙, Iku ta L̥viḥ pinakacihna yaktiniṅ apəpəgatan∙, sidḍa hatadin harane, yenora yaktine papat iku, dudu tadin harane, duruṁ pəgat uga palaki-rabine, hana: po
voṁ vadon maṅka:na, tan pacihna hapəpəgatan∙, tumuli halaki riṅ len∙, kaṅ haṅalap∙ ḍəṇḍanən pataṁ lakṣa de saṁ hamava bhūmi ,, 0 ,,
hana voṁ harusak titipan∙, yaktine, den*∙-bukti de
n-aṅgo, den-salini rupa, tan pamit riṁ kaṅ adr̥ve titipan∙, hika ta vnaṁ haranana valat∙, tikahe pada kalavan sabda rinusak∙, saguṅ iṁ paR̥gani titipan palukudən den-mulihanikəlya,
mariṅ kaṅ atitip∙, tur ḍəṇdanən∙ roṁ lakṣa, denira saṅ amava bumi, kaliṅaniṅ arusak titipan paḍa kalavan maliṁ ,, 0 ,,
hana voṁ hamatenin kahulaniṁ voṁ, tan padosa vet∙niṁ səR̥ṅəne, kaṁ
ṅ hamateni, kaṁ hamateni hamanavurana hutaṅe kaṁ den-pateni hika, mulihanikəl kaṅ amariṁ kaṅ adr̥ve kahula, tur haveḥha paṅəlina-sava voluṅ untiṁ, Ika ka:hilaṅani doṣa, hamat
eni,, maniḥ hana voṁ hamateni voṁ tan padoṣa, dudu kavulaniṁ voṁ, savetniṁ saR̥ṅəne kaṅ amateni, yogya kaṅ amateni ḍəṇda:nən denira saṅ amava bumi, ḍənda voluṁ
lakṣa, turr aveha paṅliṁ-sava, mariṁ sanakadaṁ-vargganiṁ mati, paṅli voluṁ tali ,, 0 ,,
hana voṅ adr̥ve titipan∙, yen pinet∙ denira saṅ amava bhumi, yeñ coloṅən deniṁ maliṁ, ye bahakən deni v
oṁ, yen katunon∙, yen keliya riṅ bañu, yen hilaṅa katahurag∙, deniṁ guṅiṁ praṁ, tan∙ vnaṁ hiku palakunən denikaṅ atitip∙, Apan kapañcasadarane , 0 ,
riṁ voṁṅ ahuta pari, yen liva sakiṅ li
maṅ tahun tan hamanavuriṁ tumuli, hiṅane hanikəl piṁlima, hiku patəḥ-patəḥhe saṁ li hagama ,, 0 ,,
hana kavula vadon∙ yen meṅgat sakiṁ gustine, maniḥ kaṅ lanaṁ kavulaniṁ voṁ miṅgat ṣakiṁ gustine, hatmu pa
ḍa kavula riṁ paryḍiṅgatan∙, halaki-harabi paḍa miṅgat∙, halavas hana ri deśa len∙, Akeḥ hanake, hana lanaṁ hana vadon∙, vkasan kaluruḥ dene gustine, kaṅ adr̥ve kavula vadon∙, de
ne kaṅ adr̥ve lanaṅ kavula lanaṁ, Anake dumən∙, mariṁ kaṅ adr̥ve kavula lanaṁ, roṁ duman∙, marikaṁṅ adr̥ve kavula vadon saduman∙, yen mati kaṅ ladaṁ karuhun∙, kaṁveṅ adr̥ve
kavula vadon hameta mapomaḥhe sasuhuna,, kavula vadon muliya mariṁ gustine maniḥ, yen mati ka vadon karuhun∙, kaṅ adr̥ve kavulavadon pap**n∙, lanaṁ hameta pomah-omahe saRmbat∙,
kavula lanaṁ muliha mariṁ gustine maniḥ, saR̥mbat sasuhun ubaga padumane, maṅkana hujar riṁ saṅ yaṁ sa*sastra ,, 0 ,,
kavula vadon maL̥r iṁ gustine, pinalaku deniṁ kavulaniṁ voṁ, yen palakunən∙ deniṅ vo ta
n kavulani voṁ pinakarabīne, vetiṁṅ aR̥pe riṁ kavula vadon ika, Anutakən paṅavulanen riṁ kavula vadon∙, sakehe hanake, sadr̥vene kaṅ adr̥ve kavula vadon uga viśeṣa, vnaṁṅa hame
ta,
yen∙ rabine vo menak, mon mati kavula lanaṁṅ ika, kaṁ vadon men*ak kadumana hanake satuṅgal∙ kevala, maṅkana darmmane sakiṁṅ agama , 0 ,
riṁ voṅ atitip∙ dr̥ve riṁ voṁ tan panak-a
nak, yen atitipa dr̥ve riṁ voṅ anəluḥ∙, duruṁ den-palaku titipane hika:, kablət mati kaṁ de-titipin∙, nora kavasa titipane hika yen den-palakuha, hanumpak iṁ paṅ akiṅ araknya, dr̥ve yen maṅkana , 0 ,
riṁ
voṁṅ atatavaṇ lavan∙ rara, den-siṅidakən∙ riṁṅ alas∙ kara:kṣane, yen katmu deni bapani rara kaṁṅ anavakən∙, yogya hamatenana voṁṅ atuvane reara hika, *yen katəmu karoron∙-roron i desaha
, yen i rahinaha, nora vnaṁ patenana deniṁ voṁṅ atuvani rara hika, kaṁṅ anavanakən ika, haṅi dunuṅan i tatavan ika, dəndanən∙ ⌈va:roṁ lakṣa denira saṅ amava bhumi , 0 ,
yen hana rare halit ḍuruṁ bhiṣa hadambu
t gave, haṅer-ṅer riṁ voṁ, hahutaṁ paṅan∙, bhakṭaḍaśa harane, yen aR̥p huṅaha sani gnaḥhe haṅer, mahu bhiṣa hanambut gave luṅa kaR̥pe, panagavurane hutaṁ paṅan∙ voluṁ tali riṁ kaṅ aṅiṅoni sa
ṅkan alit ika:, maṅkana śasanane sakiṁ sastra: , 0 ,
yen hana voṁ hañeloṁ paravu, dudu parahunira saṅ amava bhumi, yen paravu sarupane, kala rahina dene hañoloṁ, ḍəndanən salakṣa denira saṅ amava bhu
mi, tur parahu kaṁ den∙-coloṁ riṁka muliha hanikəl samulene R̥gane , va ,
yen hana voṁ hamalakekakən∙ rabini voṁ haṅundaṅ iṁ tuṅgale sapakaraman∙, la:van kadaṅ-vargganiṅ lanaṅ, kadaṅ-varggani vadon∙, pada den-undaṁ, hiku voṁ
hamaraṁ laraṅan araṁne, kaṁṅ amalakekən∙ ḍəṇdaha hamataṁ lakṣa, maniḥ hundaṁṅ-undaṅane sakeye ka vəruḥ yen∙ rabini voṁ kaṁ den-varaṅ ika:, kaḍəṇdaha roṁ lakṣa riṁ voṁ satuṅgal-tuṅgal∙, tan vəru yen laraṅan kaṁ den va
raṁṅ ika:, milu kondaṁ, ḍəṇda salakṣa, riṁ vo satuṅgal∙ voṁ ka milu hanambuṁṅ iṁ luṅguḥ, nora vəruḥ riṁṅ avadine kaḍəndaha lima tali, riṁ voṁ satuṅgal∙-satuṅgal , va ,
hana ta voṁṅ-atuvani rara, huvus ana
ṅgapi tukon iṅ aṁlalamar∙, samapta payu, hasaṅketa patəmune havavaraṅan∙, jajaka hika haṅanti sa-hujariṁ voṅ-atuhaniṅ rara, tka riṁ pasamaya den-palakekən iṁ voṁ len∙, deniṁ bapaniṁ rara, yen maṅkana, saguṁniṁ
tukon mu*liḥ hanikəl∙, tur voṁṅ-atuvaniṁ rara kadəṇda:ha pataṁ lakṣa denira saṁṅ amava bhumi ,, 0 ,,
yen hana voṁ vadon elik iṁ lakiṁ-laki*ne, vetniṁ tan paR̥pe, tukone muliḥ hanikəl∙, hamadal śaṅga
a harane,, 0 ,,
yen hana voṁṅ anunoni pari riṁ savaḥ hiṅ asavaḥ saguṁ-lit iṁ pari muliḥhanikəl∙ piṁ lima mariṁṅ kaṅ adr̥ve * pari, tur kaḍəṇdaha roṁ lakṣa denira saṅ amava bhu:mi,, 0 ,,
riṁ Aṣṭacoraḥ varahakna, la
kṣaṇa hamamaliṁ, hakon amamaliṅa, haveḥ paṅan iṁ mali, haveḥ gnaḥ hiṁ maliṁ, samitra lavan maliṁ , hatudu saṅkaniṁ maliṁ holiḥha dalan∙, Atuluṁ maliṁ, haniṅidakən maliṁ, hiku hastacoraḥ harane,
yogya dəndanən denira saṁṅ amava bumi, yan hamaṅkana, hana po bapaniṁ maliṁ, Ibuniṁ maliṁ hanakiṁ maliṁ, kadaṁṅiṁ maliṁ, kabeḥ hika tan∙ yogya dəndanən denira saṅ amava bhumi, yen tan milu maliṁ, riṁ voṁ lumakṣaṇa malu
lumaku maliṁ, Akon amaliṁṅa, haveḥ paṅaniṁ maliṁ, haveḥ gnaḥhiṁ maliṁ, Amitra maliṁ, AnuduḥAkən ṣaṅkani maliṁ vəruḥA, hatuluṁ maliṁ haṇiṅiddakən mali, kavolu hiku yogya tiba:nana ḍəṇdaneən denira saṅ ami
va saṅa bumi,
riṁ voṁ lakṣaṇa maliṁ-maliṁ, lavan hakon amaliṅana, ⌈nṣayen ṣacihna sayakti, hadoṣa pati hiku karo denira saṁṅ amava bumi, hanak-rabiniṁ maliṁ, lavan sadr̥veniṁ maliṁ, kapanjiṁ ginəna
hakiən riṁ pavoniṁra saṅ amava bumi, paknana didol∙ vinevehakən denira saṅ amava bhumi,, kunəṁ hadak∙-rabineiṁ hakon amamaliṅa kariṁ, ḍəṇdanən ṣalakṣa denira saṅ amava bhumi, yen pada hak
on hamamaliṅa lavan anan∙-rabine, pada ḍosanana pati ḍenira saṁṅ amava bhumi. riṁ voṅ aveḥ gnaḥ iṁ maliṁ, ka*lavan kaṅ aveḥ paṅan∙, yen sacina sayakṭi, ḍəṇdanən∙ roṁ lakṣa, denira saṅ ama
va bhu:mi, den-anuṅgal∙-nuṅgal∙, Atanak∙-rabine tan∙ ḍəndanən ika:,, riṁ voṁ haniṅidakən maliṁ kalavan arakṣa maliṁ, hamuvus∙ yen tan maliṁ, haddohakən∙ maliṁ, tur kavan sacihna sayakti yen ma
liṁ turama, ḍəṇdanən pataṁ lakṣa denira saṅ amava bhu:mi kaṅ aṅubuṅ iṁ maliṁ,, vəruh yen hana maliṁ tur mnəṁ, Alavas pamitrane maliṁṅ ika, ḍəndanən ṣalakṣa deniṁra saṅ amava bhumi, doṣane vəruḥ yen maliṁ
tur-api tan vəruḥ tur pamaL̥rana, mariha hamitra maliṁ,,
kaṅ amaliṁ yen kacaṇḍak∙ patine, Anak∙-rabine, dr̥vene lmaḥhe, vetən∙ denira saṅ amava bhu:mi, yen hana kavulane lanaṁ vado
n∙, tan petən denira saṅ amava bhu:mi, luvara sahutaṁṅe riṁ maliṁṅ ika,
panəbusan iṁ maliṁ yen amalaku hiṅurip∙, voluṁ tali riṁ voṁ saduṅgal-sagaduṅgal∙, maṅkana kaluvarane, ḍənda pataṁ lakṣa mariṁ saṅ amava§
bumi, paṅəli śavara mariṁ kaṁ minaliṅan∙, satagūṁṅiṁ dr̥ve hiṅalap i maliṁ mulihanikəla riṁ minaliṅan∙, maṅkana liṁṅiṅ agama,,
yen hana deśa hana kampihan∙, holiḥ maliṁ təṇdasiṁ maliṁ, lavan pomah-omahe, hanak∙-rabin
e,, haturakna riṁ saṅ amava bhumi, maṅkana yuktiniṁ laku, kunəṁ kaṁdaṁ-vargganiṁ maliṁ yen ṭan milu hamaliṁ yan yukti Ika dəṇdanən∙, voṁṅ aveḥ hupakara riṁ maliṁ, haveḥ mantraniṁṅ amamaliṁ, ya guruniṁṅ amamaliṁṅ aradi tukarre
Ahucapan∙ pa
ḍa səR̥ṅən kaṅ iṅupa lavan aṅuva,, tan haṅga sala tuṅgal∙ mnəṅa, Aṅaṅgas tan vinehan hati harane, liṅ i saṅ hyaṅ a:gama, vkasan pekṣan dene haṅala vuvaḥ, haṅupaḥhakən∙, hapan hahucapan baribin karuhan∙ yen amateni v
oṁ tan padosa, hiku padḍa coraḥ harane, hujar riṁ sastra, yen hana voṁ maṁkana, karo hadoṣa hapati denira saṅ abumi,, 0 ,,
riṁ voṁ Ambak ḍupṭa si cahulahe hala, sagavene hagave papa-pa:takane havake, makaḍi ma
liṁ, luṅha sakiṁ gnaḥhe, malayu sapaḥrane ruruhən denira saṅ amava bhumi, katəmu poh ika voṁ maṅkana, patenana kayogyane denira saṅ amava bhu:mi, sakehe kaṁ milu riṁṅ iya,,
riṁ vo gənənahan deniṁ duṣṭa, dahat arusu makadi §
maliṁ, kayogyane patenana rumuhun kaṁ duṣṭa dahat arusuḥ hikā makadi maliṁ, kayogyaniṁ laku kaṁ gnaḥhiṅ arusuḥ hika sahanane dr̥vene rampasən ika denira saṅ aR̥p iṁ kr̥ttha Arakṣa bhumi,,
yen hana voṁṅ adoṣa riṁ sira saṅ a
mava bhumi, hana ta voṁ tan paveḥ patihane kaṅ adoṣa: riṁ sira hika, vet i sihe riṁṅ iya, yen haguṁ pavehe su riṁ voṁ kaṁṅ adoṣa: riṁ saṁṅ amava bhumi hika, munḍurra saṁ rupmakṣa hameva yuhaniṁ buminira den-ava
ra, saṅkane vuruṅa mati voṁ kaṅ arusuḥ hika, yen hana voṁ maṅkana, yogya hilokna kapatihaniṅ arusuḥ duṣṭa makadi maliṁ, hambahakan∙, hambaranaṁ, hamlagaṇḍaṁ, haṅalaraṅan∙, hamateni voṁ tan padoṣa, haṅupasi, hanluḥ,,
yea Iku sarvva-harusuḥ harane, yen sacihna yakti, maṅkana liṁṅira sa paṇdita sa pgat iṁ haji kuṭara manava, sa vəruḥ riṁ hala:-hayu, saṁ vəruḥ riṁ margganiṁ papa lavan marganiṁ hanemu śvargga,, yen hana voṁ haṅiṁloniṁ harusuḥ, va hapihalaṁ haṅa
vara riṁ śabda kevala, ḍəṇḍanika roṁ lakṣa denira saṅ amava bhumi,, kaṁṅ apihalaṁ śabḍa hiku, voṁṅ amaṅikətakən∙ sukani vaṅke harane,,
riṁ voṁṅ ahula sahahūcasapən maṅke,, hana voṁ sahasa, haklar dene kavaniṁne, Aṅa
dekə*n akeḥ varganne, haṅadekən dene sugiḥ, saṅkane tan hana den-keriṅi,, Avuru dene kinavden iṁ sama-samane, aməraṁ pagər iṅ apagər∙, nora den-pet holiḥhe məraṁ pagər ika, yen maṅka
na dənda lima tali,, den-pet ypagər ika, ḍəṇda salakṣa, bhaṅga tur anaṅ taṁ ḍənda roṁ lakṣa, ḍəṇdane katur i saṅ amava bhumi,, 0 ,, voṅ anutuhi kayu siluṁ-luṁ sakiṁ tan-vəruhe, nora den-pet∙ ḍəṇda roṁ tali,
yen ora vəruḥ tur den-alap olihe hakunūḥtuḥ dəṇda pataṁ tali, yen hana voṁ ahamadur siluṁ-luṁ, Aka§rana sakiṁ valat∙, samulene R̥gane kayu siluṁ-luṁ, den-ulihakna hanikəl piṁ ro, tur kaḍəṇdaha ro lakṣa,
sahasa hamalat∙ voṁṅi len∙ ḍə, denira saṅ amava bhumi, yen hana voṁ hamadur kayu-kayu len∙, haka:raṇa sahasa∙, ḍəṇḍa pataṁ taṁli, 0 , yen sahasa: hamalat∙ kbo-sampini len∙, dəṇḍa va:roṁ lakṣa, sa
ha:sa ha:malat∙ voṁṅ iṁ len∙ ḍəndea roṁ lakṣa, ḍəṇda kahatur riṁ saṅ amava bhumi, huliḥ-hulihaniṁ kbo-sampi, salvirre kaden-valat∙, makadi yen voṁ, mulihanikəl piro mariṁ kaṅ adr̥ve,,
ye
